text: The Sea Chase is a 1955 American World War II drama movie directed by John Farrow and was based on the novel of the same name by Andrew Geer. It stars John Wayne, Lana Turner, David Farrar, Lyle Bettger, Tab Hunter, John Qualen, James Arness and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1955 drama movies Category:1955 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:World War II movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by John Farrow
title: The Sea Chase
